hotel.name: Mövenpick Myth Hotel Patong Phuket
hotel.address: Rat U-thit Soi 2 200 Pee Road, Patong, Kathu

it: Utilizzo di prodotti chimici efficaci contro il Coronavirus
Biancheria, asciugamani e bucato lavati secondo le linee guida delle autorità locali
Alloggio disinfettato tra un soggiorno e l'altro
Distanziamento fisico nelle aree di ristoro
Cibo consegnato presso l'alloggio degli ospiti
Lo staff segue tutti i protocolli di sicurezza come indicato dalle autorità locali
Cancelleria in comune come menu stampati, riviste, penne e carta rimossa
Rispetto delle regole di distanziamento fisico
Cibo consegnato è coperto in modo sicuro
Maschere per il viso disponibili per gli ospiti
en-gb: Use of cleaning chemicals that are effective against Coronavirus
Linens, towels and laundry washed in accordance with local authority guidelines
Guest accommodation is disinfected between stays
Food can be delivered to guest accommodation
Staff follow all safety protocols as directed by local authorities
Shared stationery such as printed menus, magazines, pens, and paper removed
es: Piscina al aire libre (todo el año)
Cámaras de seguridad en las zonas comunes
Cámaras de seguridad en el exterior
Uso de productos químicos de limpieza efectivos contra el coronavirus
Ropa de cama, toallas y lavandería lavadas según las indicaciones de las autoridades locales
El alojamiento de los huéspedes se desinfecta entre estancias
Distanciamiento físico en las zonas de comedor
La comida se puede entregar en el alojamiento de los huéspedes
El personal sigue todos los protocolos de seguridad indicados por las autoridades locales
Se ha eliminado el material compartido, como menús impresos, revistas, bolígrafos y papel
Se siguen las normas de distanciamiento físico
La comida entregada está bien cubierta
fr: Chaises longues ou chaises de plage
Caméras de surveillance dans les parties communes
Utilisation de produits chimiques de nettoyage efficaces contre le coronavirus
Linge de lit, serviettes et lessive lavés conformément aux directives des autorités locales
Le logement des clients est désinfecté entre les séjours
Distanciation physique dans les espaces de restauration
La nourriture peut être livrée dans l'hébergement des clients
Le personnel respecte tous les protocoles de sécurité comme indiqué par les autorités locales
Papeterie partagée comme les menus imprimés, magazines, stylos et papier supprimés
La nourriture livrée est bien couverte
Accès à des professionnels de santé
de: Verwendung von Reinigungsmitteln, die gegen Coronaviren wirksam sind
Bettwäsche, Handtücher und Wäsche werden gemäß den Richtlinien der örtlichen Behörden gewaschen
Die Gästeunterkunft wird zwischen den Aufenthalten desinfiziert
Essen kann in die Gästeunterkunft geliefert werden
Das Personal befolgt alle Sicherheitsprotokolle, wie von den örtlichen Behörden vorgeschrieben
Geteilte Büroartikel wie gedruckte Menüs, Zeitschriften, Stifte und Papier wurden entfernt

description.it:
Mövenpick Myth Hotel Patong Phuket has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a restaurant and bar in Patong Beach. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a kids' club and free WiFi.

A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

The hotel offers a sun terrace.

Popular points of interest near Mövenpick Myth Hotel Patong Phuket include Patong Beach, Kalim Beach and Patong Boxing Stadium. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 34 km from the accommodation.

name.it: Deluxe King Room with Pool Access - Free cancellation
name.en: Deluxe King Room with Pool Access - Free cancellation
name.es: Deluxe King Room with Pool Access - Free cancellation
name.fr: Deluxe King Room with Pool Access - Free cancellation
name.de: Deluxe King Room with Pool Access - Free cancellation

446965416.description: The private pool is a top feature of this double room. Featuring free toiletries and bathrobes, this double room includes a private bathroom with a bath, a shower and a hairdryer. The spacious air-conditioned double room features a flat-screen TV with cable channels, soundproof walls, a minibar, a tea and coffee maker as well as pool views. The unit has 1 bed.

cribs_and_extra_beds.text: Supplements are not calculated automatically in the total costs and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
The maximum number of cots, extra beds and children allowed in existing beds may vary depending on the option you book.
All cots and extra beds are subject to availability.

children_at_the_property.text: Children of any age are welcome.
Children 12 years and above will be charged as adults at this property.

name.fr: Two-Bedroom Family Suite with Pool View - Free cancellation
name.de: Two-Bedroom Family Suite with Pool View - Free cancellation

446965418.description: The spacious suite has 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom with a bath and free toiletries. The air-conditioned suite features a flat-screen TV with cable channels, soundproof walls, a minibar, a tea and coffee maker as well as pool views. The unit has 2 beds.

cribs_and_extra_beds.text: There is no capacity for extra beds or cots.

children_at_the_property.text: Children of any age are welcome.
Children 12 years and above will be charged as adults at this property.
